website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for an inexpensive cover may want to consider this plastic option for its supreme protection against liquid and pet hair.
pros: Clear construction keeps the couch design visible to guests
Simple to take on and off
Size covers most couches, chairs, and ottomans
cons: Plastic is too thin for some, as pet nails can easily rip through the material

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to protect my furniture from my furkids. The plastic cover reminds me of something you would put over furniture before putting it in storage...It's not pretty and it is not form fitting. I use it for added protection under a traditional couch cover. I pull the plastic back from the arms of the chair so you really can't see the plastic under my fabric cover. I had to do a lot of tucking and folding but overall, it works well for me. The plastic is very thick and durable, and it gives me the added protection I'm looking for without being a total eye sore. Make sure you measure your couch before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I bought four covers and I am pretty happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought four covers and I am pretty happy with them, good thickness of the plastic. We bought them to protect our couch, loveseat, chair and ottoman from our psycho cat who pees on anything that she deems "hers". We cover everything up when we are at work or sleeping, and so far the covers keep cats totally off. The chair cover did not cover our oversized chair, but it covered the ottoman perfectly so we just got another loveseat cover. Not the prettiest solution.
customer_reviews.author: cmoney

customer_reviews.title: thin material- not meant for pets
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sofa cover- it fits and looks as described, but it is most certainly not for pets. I have 2 dogs and 4 cats. The nails rip right through it. we had to tap the tears to where it ended up being more tap and less plastic cover. Also, standard clear packing tap is stronger than this plastic cover. My cats never touched the sofa, they hide because of the dogs. so with just 2 small dogs (less than 40lb each who have their nails trimmed regularly) this cover was ripped to shreds in a matter of 6wks.
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful product, just what I need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this plastic cover to protect my furniture. I just adopted a cat that is a big scratcher, and I'd like to make some adjustments around my house rather than get her declawed. This cover was the best quality for the price. It's a nice weight and seems very well constructed. This "loveseat" size one was actually the perfect fit for my medium-sized couch, so be sure to check the dimensions they provide in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Clair L. Melton

customer_reviews.title: A Great Prophylactic!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely. Packaged neatly. Looks nice and simple. Feels durable. My couch is protected from spills, splashes, scratches, bugs, ninja attacks, mortar attacks - there is just one problem related to it... ...the like cover for reclining chair are out of stock - everywhere - MIA, ghost, gone, invisible, "beam me up Scotty", cannot find it, cannot get it, screwed, SOL, "too bad bud". Hopefully, this will change soon, as I have two recliners who are vulnerable and ready for be armored up.
customer_reviews.author: The Oracle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Furniture Protector From Cats
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of protecting my furniture from cat mess, marking spots well. But it does not protect my furniture from cat scratches. I bought several of this item to cover up my book case, chairs, coffee table. So far so good. Except for one. Cat scratched one of this covers over the chair. But the cover is still good to use, so not a deal breaker for me. Cat makes a mess on my furniture, then it is easy to clean. So I say it is helpful product.
customer_reviews.author: feline_graduate_studentTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy! Where do I begin? First of all this is not suitable for leather couch as it’s hard to keep it in place. Secondly my dog was able to bite through it and make holes very quickly. Thirdly, each time my dog would jump on the couch, cover would slide right off the couch down the floor...
customer_reviews.author: ElenorY

customer_reviews.title: Cats hate these!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic covers! The fit was perfect for both my brand new Lazyboy recliner and old sofa in the basement. They are super easy to put on and remove and really don’t look to shabby. What I truly love is that my many cats absolutely hate these covers and steer clear of the sofa and new recliner! Yay! I win! These are worth every penny for the protection and piece of mind they give me. Now I don’t have to close off rooms or cover everything in foil, lol. My only regret is not finding these furniture savers sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Snowcat60Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bobcat proof!
customer_reviews.text: We raised a young bobcat for a local zoo and were concerned about our leather furniture so we ordered these covers. Not a perfect fit but they seemed to do the job for cheap plastic covers, and our furniture pieces are quite large. For our armchair we had to order a loveseat cover, then cut it down to size with scissors and use clear gorilla tape to put it back together. Worked great! The bobcat didn't seem to be any harder on the furniture than our big tabby cat... go figure?
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: The clear plastic couch cover is great! It's durable and plastic is crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: The clear plastic couch cover is great! It's durable and plastic is crystal clear. Your beautiful couch is still visible. It's a bit big, however I'm able to tuck it in the cushions like a clothe cover. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Borschtgirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would cover and protect more of our sofa from our cat than our usual solution does. It looks terrible. The seams are difficult to maneuver into place and the entire cover just feels flimsy and cheap. I have freezer bags that are stronger than this material. This is more of a cover for storage than for preventing cat scratches. Our current solution is vinyl sheeting from Hobby Lobby, cut to fit the most obvious target areas. I used clear spiral shaped upholstery tacks to hold it in place. It is MUCH thicker and more durable than this. After trying this cover on, we quickly switched back to our old vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: BayouBlondie

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can find to protect my whole couch from naughty cats, but its always slipping and it just a real pain in the butt to keep placed properly on my couch. Also the fact this is a couch with two reclining chairs makes this even more of a pain. I wish there was something with this product that kept it in place and made it stay put.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great to protect furniture from kids and small, less/non destructive animals.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, but unfortunately it was just no match for my large puppies. If we had a slightly LESS chaotoc home, it would most definitely still be in one piece on our couch. Unfortunately, it lasted all of 2 weeks. No fault of the manufacturer, like i said, it worked great until we turned our backs amd the dogs thougt it would be a great idea to pull it off and play fight on and under it. It lasted 2 weeks on our house, which is a new record. Nothing else has made it that long.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: This plastic sofa cover covers my entire large sofa all the way down in the back and on the sides and front. It is heavy duty plastic and therefore deters my grand-cat from scratching my beautiful leather couch when she's staying with me for days at a time. I don't have to worry now when I leave the house that kitty will scratch my furniture. I also bought a recliner cover and it is every bit as good as the couch cover. Does the Job!
customer_reviews.author: caroline n.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This plastic cover is the bomb! This is my second purchase because my teenage boys kept sitting on it and it split open pretty quickly. I use it on a couch in their game room where our cats like to hang out often. With 6 cats you get a lot of hair so I keep it covered when the boys are not playing video games in there. The cats still sleep on it dispite the plastic cover. It covers every inch so it works great for my purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Peace feline

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of protecting upholstery
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of protecting upholstery. I bought a nice new couch, but the scratching, puking and shedding of several cats threatened to turn it into a disaster in no time. So I buried it in layers of protection--a slipcover, which was backbreaking to put on and take off for cleaning, so was in turn covered with a weird assemblage of blankets and throws.This cover replaces that mess, whips on and off very quickly, is well made and I can see my sofa again! I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Constanza

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a bit big, the positives by far outweigh that. Our indoor/outdoor cat marks the sofa and no matter how many products I've tried he keeps doing it and sitting on our sofa was very uncomfortable because of the smell. After putting this on, the smell is contained under the thick plastic. I put a large blanket over the plastic to make it more comfortable as I don't like the feel of plastic nor do I want my dogs claws to rip it. I highly recommend this if you have a similar problem or just to protect it from pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Q.

customer_reviews.title: Furniture Protector-Sofa
customer_reviews.text: This product is beyond my expectations and I am thrilled to have it; it is exactly what I wanted,never expected to find! I didn't want the "fitted" plastic covers ,but I wanted something that would not only protect my furniture,but would allow the furniture to be visible and this product is perfect!! 😛😘 I will be ordering other products from this company and I will be recommending the company to family and friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Judi R. Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Not For Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: This product looked perfect when I got it-- decent thickness and shape. It of course didn't fir my chairs perfectly, so I ended up taping the edges together to make a closer fit at the bottom (I have cats who like to climb) and they worked great for a few weeks. I bought two of these, one for a chair I use every day and the other almost never, and after a few weeks of use the seams started tearing out of the one that gets used often. If you're looking to cover something you use every day, I suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: you will be disappointed. It's not designed to fit a sofa or ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT as pictured. If you're looking for something that might actually fit a chair or has the dimensions of a chair, you will be disappointed. It's not designed to fit a sofa or an ottoman. But it's a very very very loose definition of something designed to fit a chair. I'm still looking for something to protect my wool fabric chair from the annual invasion during moth season. So if anyone know of a product line ...
customer_reviews.author: John in Seatte

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased covers for our new couch and chairs in the living room and we were very surprised how well they fit the furniture. Not sure how well they will hold up to the cat traffic since they have only been on the furniture for a day but so far they are holding up great. I also want to add that once you open the package you will immediately notice the plastic smell but all you need to do is open it up completely and let it air out for a while. The smell will not completely go away but you will not notice it when put on the furniture. Picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Looney

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in place if you use your furniture
customer_reviews.text: While it may be easy to clean etc. etc. none of that really matters if the thing won't stay in place. Tried to use for a couple days. You can't sit on it without it sliding all over the place. Maybe other's will find this product useful but I just wasted the money on a huge poor fitting dry cleaning bag.
customer_reviews.author: Scotts hobbie shop

customer_reviews.title: Got pets,Get protection
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace a cheaper thick bulky plastic sofa cover previously purchased from a mail order catalog. This cover is quality made, thinner, and more comfortable to sit on. The plastic is very clear and lets the beauty of the furniture show through. I wasn't sure about the price and thought it was a little high, but did comparison shopping and decided to make the purchase. Even though it is thin plastic, its very durable. My primary reason for purchase was to protect new sofa from two dogs. It protects well, wipes clean easily, and doesn't tear from dogs jumping on it. I even ordered the same item in loveseat size.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Pineiro

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy! CHEAP COVER THAT DOES NOT PROTECT!
customer_reviews.text: 1st. it doesnt fit my couch correctly and the measurements were actually slightly larger than my couches size so it shouldve no problem... 2nd. My cats claws punchers little holes all over it within the first week i noticed... 3rd. one of my cats made an accident and it the pee got into my couch cushion and now we have been fighting gettkng the ammonia smell out.. so long story short this product was a waste of money and i would not recommend it to anyone and i really wish i could be refunded my money back.. good advertising to pull you in, to then disappoint when you recieve the product... and i fell for it...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Heavy gage plastic chair cover
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It’s plenty big enough for large or medium recliner chair. The quality is superb Great if you had to put furniture in storage too. Really nice I would buy it again and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: It works for what I need it for at the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need it for at the moment it's more of something you put on the couch as if your going to store in a shed or something and not sit on it it came in quickly and over all is well stitched I'm going to re sew it on a chair I'm keeping outside
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Too big :(
customer_reviews.text: The product seems like it would be strong and hold up well, but the arm chair size was way too big. My chair looked like the picture but the size would have been better for a huge recliner and a big arm chair the side of a one person sofa. I was very disappointed. I hope they make a size to fit wig back chairs. As soon as they so then I will buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Perel

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR FURNITURE FROM ANIMALS & ACCIDENTS
customer_reviews.text: IT IS HEAVY WEIGHT AND GOES ON EASILY! LOOKS VERY NICE AND JUST TAKE IT OFF WHEN YOU HAVE GUEST AND YOUR FURNITURE HAS BEEN COMPLETELY PROTECTED FROM EVERYTHING! (IN MY CASE 4 CATS!). SO EASY TO CLEAN TOO! CATS HAVE NOT ONE TIME TRIED TO SCRATCH THE COVER EITHER! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: ANN NEELY

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy two covers and adapt them to my L shaped sofa.
customer_reviews.text: It is a shame this manufacturer doesn't make covers for L shaped sofas, I had to buy two covers and modify them to fit my sofa. One photo is with the original covers as soon I have received them and the other one is after I made some modifications. Well, it works. One of my cats peed on it and it was easy to clean, my sofa was safe. Also, one of my cats likes to scratch everything so this was a perfect solution to protect my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Konohita

customer_reviews.title: Great except if you are trying to prevent pee
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but when your cat or dog pees on it the plastic forever smells like pee. But if you are just worried about spills then I highly reccomend! It does stop the liquid from going through and definitely fit my couches.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to protect my couch that one of my cats has decided would make a good litter box. It’s easy to put on. Not very pretty but wasn’t looking for aesthetics. Would recommend to pet owners or anyone looking to protect their couch from damage.
customer_reviews.author: rebe89

customer_reviews.title: I HATE IT
customer_reviews.text: Ripped at the seam less than a week after I bought it. Also, it sticks to itself worse than Saran Wrap so when my cat eventually did pee on it, there were a million cracks and crevices that we’re filled with pee!!! Ugggggghhhh! Way overpriced and also very crappy.
customer_reviews.author: heather revill

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great product if it was more durable. I’ve purchased two of these for my grandmother and they haven’t even lasted more than a month. It would be great if they were tougher or if it was for a chair you didn’t use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bigger size and my couch is a tad smaller but I like it having extra room. I have dogs and kids so I was really hoping this would help me keep things cleaner. The only complaint I have so far is I thought it would be thicker. I put a blanket over the plastic but I am still worried my dogs will punch a hole in it, or my 4yr old who pretends the floor is lava will jump too hard. Update: lasted maybe a couple weeks. Even with a thick sheet protecting it, ripped all along the seems on the seats
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this product. It's too loose and doesn't stay in place. I've tried tucking it in and tried to secure it as much as possible, but in less than you know it, it's messy again. While I find something better, I will keep struggling with it, but I would recommend anyone else to look for a better solution (let me know if you find one ;) )
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We like the products and they protect the furniture well, however we can't seem to get them to send the correct 3rd piece for our large sofa. They have twice now sent us a loveseat cover instead of what we actually need.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M Winstom

customer_reviews.title: The stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: 1.The material is durable. There was enough plastic to amply covet a full size couch. 2. Performance The cat does not know what to do with this stuff. She will usually hop off or sit on it calmly.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping upholstery protected from my cat
customer_reviews.text: This clear cover fit over my upholstered chair perfectly as I had measured my chair and matched it to the best cover that would work for it and I just secured a piece of twine around the bottom part of my chair to keep my cat from trying to climb underneath the cover and lay on the chair cushion. After trying many products to deter my cat from clawing the chair upholstery this was the only one that protected it from her. She will lay on the protected cushion but no more trying to claw it. It also is comfortable to sit on or I can easily remove it and place it back on when I leave the room.
customer_reviews.author: KimJ

customer_reviews.title: No protection against pets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch cover for its advertised protection against pet scratching/clawing. First thing I noticed: The plastic is very thin and the odor of the plastic is head-ache inducing, but I thought I'd give it a shot anyway (even though it also arrived late). I have had it for about five hours now and my pet has already put a hole through it. Does not work as advertised (it's also very loud to sit on).
customer_reviews.author: Abby boone

customer_reviews.title: Low quality item, won't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty low quality item. We got it for our new couch and within a week, the plastic ripped in the middle of the couch. We are not heavy people either so I'm unsure why it ripped unless of course the quality is rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: BEB

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it fits fine on a regular/larger sized couch
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I need it to. Keeps my cat from peeing on the couch. Because my couch is on the smaller side, it is not a snug fit. But I'm sure it fits fine on a regular/larger sized couch. Does a great job at protecting it. :) *review ammendment * Ripped. I just pray my cat doesn't find the ripped parts. :( Still, it is the cheapest and really only solution I could find.

customer_reviews.title: No more kitty clawing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect chair cover. It is made for a larger chair but tucks around perfectly so my cat can't claw it. It is a thicker material, water resistant. My cat likes to lay on it! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Furniture Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cover for my very large recliner, so I bought the loveseat one since the chair one was not big enough. I turned it so the width of the loveseat was covering the length of the recliner from the top to the footrest, and it works well. Heavy gauge material that is very well stitched shows the high quality of this cover. Thanks to the seller!
customer_reviews.author: ladyjazz17

customer_reviews.title: Good fit as described.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best cover I have ordered. Size is perfect and the fit w/c is the most important is perfect. It doesnt move around as those cloth ones I have. Now I ordered the love seat cover. Thing is it has the same price as the sofa. But it fits really good w/c is number one for me. Material is a little bit thinner than I expect but maybe so you can sit on it. All in all Im satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Alma Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Better than the first ones we had ordered
customer_reviews.text: These are a far superior product than the first ones we ordered, The first ones rip, the seams were inferior, and they need to be replaced. These are a thicker material, the seams are stronger, and they don't stick to you when you sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Lenz Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you have companion animals with claws.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is waterproof and young, energetic kitten-proof. Even my two adorable rescue kittens who love climbing and jumping on any furniture in the room, haven't been able to claw through the thick plastic of this cover. It has protected my new love seat beautifully and is also large enough to cover every inch of the love seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big for chairs other than high-back Victorian style chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Poor rating due to fit. It has torn apart at the seams already, after about 3 months of use. Huge tear all along the seam.
customer_reviews.author: shena l

customer_reviews.title: Overall I give it a score of 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I thought, if you are looking for a cover it's worth it. You can't use it to keep pets off....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough and thick plastic
customer_reviews.text: It's made of a thick plastic, and it's definitely large enough for my average-sized sofa, but it didn't fit very well or stay on well. I had hoped it would be more like the form-fitting covers of the 1960s and 1970s. This will protect your furniture from dust, dirt, and fur, and isn't easy to scratch or rip, but it's more suited for storage purposes or in a room not bring used at 5 he time. The price was fair. I'm sure it could withstand being washed in a washing machine, but I am guessing it will come out wrinkled because it's a thicker plastic than a shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have thought of this with my last couch. My cat destroyed it and I never thought to buy a product like this. So far so good and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for a bratty dog that like to mark on dog room furniture
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for a bratty dog that like to mark on dog room furniture. Grrrr. If a dog chews or digs it won't stand up to punctures or chewing but it works like a charm to keep urine off. Easy to take on and off. Easy to wipe down. Perfect for what I needed. Now.lets hope this breaks her bad habit.ugh
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our brand new furniture because of the dog and cats to help with the cat fur and the doggie smell. They ended up not liking the sound or feel so now they don't get on the couch. Pup uses her bed now or the one recliner that is old. More useful than anticipated and, should have bought months ago!
customer_reviews.author: SuzeV

customer_reviews.title: Not form fitting, but works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover my recliner, couch, and love seat, because my cat started peeing on it and constantly shampooing is a headache. I thought this would be more form fitting but it's really just a generic cover, but it's easy to put in and off. It serves it's purpose and I can remove it in a few seconds, if I have guests. I have no complaints, it's thick, well put together, and you can sit on it without it trearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie  Wright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This covering is amazing. I mean unless you sleep on your couch and have box cutters as toenails, everything should be great. Very durable, resistant and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not cat resistant
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it said it was thick and cat resistant, well that is not true and now my brand new sofa is ruined because it is not claw resistant they went straight through
customer_reviews.author: purtiegertie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Priced well.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a small loveseat. The size was perfect. It was oversized but tucked very well into the cushions. Very durable. Cleans easily. Protects your furniture very well. Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CynBur

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy please make the couch cover longer.
customer_reviews.text: Couch cover wasn't long enough need longer size in length did fit the love seat and chair ☺ overall I do reccomend this quality is good 💁‍♀️great buy.will buy again reminds me of when I was lil girl Mom all over would cover their furniture in the 60s 70s😋
customer_reviews.author: Candle 🕯Light💡

customer_reviews.title: Larger than "loveseat" size.
customer_reviews.text: Product is listed in the name as "loveseat" size, but product description details state that the dimensions are for the size of a regular large sofa. The product does loosely fit a loveseat after all edges are tucked into the smaller sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, nice heavy plastic. My only complaint is that it is rather long for a love seat cover, as a result it is a rather sloppy fit. Got stuck cat sitting for 3 cats and these covers (also have a larger one for my couch) give me a sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Covers the entire chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my work chairs. We have a bed bug issue at work and this cover has been the best ever. I haven't brought any bugs home and it keeps them contained.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Recliner And Couch
customer_reviews.text: These covers are great. They have saved my couch and recliner from being destroyed by cats. My issue is the recliner cover is falling apart. It is separating at the seams causing holes. I have repaired it several times using clear packing tape. The cover over my couch is perfect. No issues. Despite the issue I'm having I'd still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: protecting from my cats
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money for me. It's not a perfect fit but I tucked it and taped it to look more fitted. It's hard to keep cats off the furniture so I wanted to protect my new chair without covering it with a blanket. I want to see and enjoy the print of the fabric of my purchase. It can be removed easily whenever you want to uncover it.
customer_reviews.author: Janiemarie

customer_reviews.title: This is almost perfect. It's a thick durable plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is almost perfect. It's a thick durable plastic, not something that's going to rip or tear easily. It is big enough for a full size couch, but they cover fits in a strange way. There's no way to fasten it so it's always moving around. It doesn't look pretty by any means. It is clear but it's very wrinkled increase in its pretty much impossible to make it straight and make it stay straight. It's a great deal for the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear plastic that has not faded or gotten opaque ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a very generous fit over two enormous Raymour and Flanigan wing chairs. Once they were on the chairs, cat lost interest. Nice clear plastic that has not faded or gotten opaque in the 2 months I've had the covers. Very pleased. Since they are so roomy, I can just pull them off the chairs when company comes, without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage it just won't stay in place not enough weight to it to stay in place plastic is always moving.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $23, more like $5!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep the cats from dirtying up our couch while we are away but as I was putting it on the plastic ripped on the cloth seam... it also wreaks of a chemical smell and doesn't properly fit.... it looks nothing like the images posted for it... I ended up having to lay the plastic it came in to cover the area it ripped in...
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This product looks much better then I expected! The material is thick and fits my couch very nicely! I was surprised to see the cover to cover the entire back part of my big couch but it did. I am very happy with product I use it almost everyday and don't mind for people to see it on my couches. My couches are protected well and I am so happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 2!

customer_reviews.title: It will definitely keep the chair it's covering in fine condition until chair is moved to "cats not allowed" ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, it's thick enough and the cats aren't interested. It will definitely keep the chair it's covering in fine condition until chair is moved to "cats not allowed" room. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Cat protection - so far
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to protect a new chair from cat claws. It is doing that very well. We wish that this and similar covers would be described dimensionally in a more accurate manner. A dimensioned sketch of the cover shown over a chair would be most helpful. The cover we bought, although a bit large, is probably what we would have bought anyway, but having the ability to check dimensions would have helped the selection process greatly.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because we have a cat that keeps peeing on the couch. It's thick and good quality and covers our large couches with extra room. I ordered another one because they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cranberry

customer_reviews.title: Have pets?  You need these
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets, then you probably want to protect your furniture from stains. These work great & are easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa79

customer_reviews.title: LAMINET Thick Crystal Clear Heavy-Duty Water Resistant Sofa/Couch Cover
customer_reviews.text: LAMINET Thick Crystal Clear Heavy-Duty Water Resistant Sofa/Couch Cover They do the job, but are noisy lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep the dogs from "marking" my leather furniture. I remove it when we have company. Works great. I did have one tear at the seam after one of the grandkids sat on the snugly fit sofa one, but I purchased two so I was able to switch it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnette Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: So this fit ok however it has a seam down the middle which leaks. My outdoor sofa is soaked. Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Diana Silvera

customer_reviews.title: Take a seat
customer_reviews.text: new white chairs so needed a cover with the grandchildren visiting - first couple of days ok but did not hold up for the week. could maybe double cover with active kids.
customer_reviews.author: debby bouchie

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to clean and to put over the couch
customer_reviews.text: I have an old cat that has a hard time making the littler box. I recently got a new couch that I didn't want ruined so I ordered this to protect my couch when I'm not home or asleep. So far it's done just that, protect my couch. Some mornings, I wake up and there is a puddle of pee on the cover. It's easy to clean and to put over the couch. I highly recommend this product for protecting furniture.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a bad kitty that gets mad if I leave her long ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a bad kitty that gets mad if I leave her long alone. She has peed on a sofa I had to trash so I got this so she didn't ruin anything else. Worked for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: MeredithM

customer_reviews.title: They still make these....Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Wow they still make these. Keeps my good chair “New” Off it comes when I get company lol
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I was potty training my two boys. it does not stay on the couch if your going to be sitting on it . We tied it down so it would stay in place, and my boys ripped it. I threw it away...
customer_reviews.author: BLUE&ARIEL

customer_reviews.title: Afraid to try again
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I received it. Easy to clean worked well with cats. The only thing wrong it tore apart in about 2weeks. I’m sorry because the one I purchased for my love seat is going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last even two months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item to protect the loveseat that our older leaky doberman sits on. Three weeks ago, we noticed a rip. Then, the entire cover was covered in rips, ruining my loveseat.
customer_reviews.author: kjs916

customer_reviews.title: I like the sofa cover
customer_reviews.text: I like the sofa cover, it is hard plastic and seems durable. Time will tell. My pup chose to nib it, climb and urinate on the sofa and the cover done its job. I will definitely buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jeva G.

customer_reviews.title: Stops Cat Scratching!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two new arm chairs for our living room in June -- and out cats discovered they are a great scratch pad. So for a few months now they've been covered up by a multitude of blankets and throw covers. With these new covers on, the cats are staying away - yay! They're easy to remove when we want to use the chairs and put back on. Thankful I found these!!!
customer_reviews.author: DBGB

customer_reviews.title: this works great
customer_reviews.text: a good large size to fit a normal size sofa. Does the job for which it is intended.
customer_reviews.author: Tanuki

customer_reviews.title: Should do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the chair and 2 couch covers to protect against an incontinent cat while out of town for a few days. Covers seem fairly substantial and completely cover my furniture items (with room to spare - I'll probably tape up the extra material to ensure no fur babies get up inside.
customer_reviews.author: ms@narrri

customer_reviews.title: I like the covers
customer_reviews.text: I like the covers, the only thing is that they were a bit too big for the love seat, sofa and wing chair.. I used tape to adjust them and now they fit okay. Could be a bit thicker, but will work for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Liander

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean – just put them into the washing machine! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this for keeping my cat from scratching too much and fur off my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend if you are trying to keep your furniture clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product was just a bit more snug on the loveseat. The plastic is not flimsy and definitely keeps the loveseat clean of animal hair. I would recommend if you are trying to keep your furniture clean from animal hair or unwanted spills. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G

customer_reviews.title: Great Thick Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits my chair which is similar to the product picture. It also fits my small swivel rocker. Plastic is thick and sturdy. I purchased 4 plus a sofa cover. I keep furniture covered when I am not using it or when company is coming over because I have 3 cats which either occassionally scratch the furniture or pee on it (my male cat). This solves both problems. Plastic is strong enough to sit on it if you wish although I prefer to sit on the furniture fabric itself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Search Alot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit for sewn plastic. Well stitched! The leather couch is outside under the portal - so I put the plastic on first, then a simple cloth couch cover, so dogs could relax outside, up off the patio. Pampered much?
customer_reviews.author: paulamjames

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Fits perfect and protects against my dogs. An added bonus is that the dogs don't like the "crinkle" sound when they jump on it so they have stopped getting on the couch at all!! Will buy another for my love seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laminat sofa cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover was fantastic very soft and pliable. Not like other stiff covers that rip and tear very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: M Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great as my parents getting older it helps protect their furniture
customer_reviews.author: Longisland-BFF

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it is a good product. Just didn't work the way I needed it to. That's on me
customer_reviews.author: tommygemini

customer_reviews.title: Laminet Recliner clear plastic protective cover
customer_reviews.text: ~~~~~5 STARS for Laminet brand protective covers and to AMAZON. We love the product, and we are also so happy with the amazingly QUICK shipping service that we got. Our cats have completely left our recliner alone since we put the Laminet protective cover on it. The beautiful fabric shows through, it cleans easily and they don't even scratch it. Thank you so much! We will be return customers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: clear and looking clean
customer_reviews.text: durable, clear, and clean looking. presentable, and good enough to put even when there are guests.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Smells like "new doll hair" but I dont find that bothersome
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to protect new couch from my kitty who likes to pee on furniture when Im not home. Thick vinyl that covers the entire couch. Smells like "new doll hair" but I dont find that bothersome. Works for me. Very big to cover sides of couch. Stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Plastic chair cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair cover because we had bedbugs, so decided to cover the chair after we got it cleaned and it has worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: D. Ighodaro

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Does what we needed it to do. Protects couch from cat and dog.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: LAMINET Thick Crystal Clear Heavy-Duty Water Resistant Sofa/Couch Cover - Perfect for Protection Against CAT/Dog Clawing, Kids and Grandkids!!! - Sofa - 42" BH x 18" FH x 96”W x 40”D
feature_bullets: HEAVY-DUTY - Protects Your Sofa from Dust, Dirt, Spills, Pet Hair and Dander, Paws and Claws!
IDEAL USAGE - Protection from Kids, Grandchildren & Pets
EASY TO CLEAN - Wipe Clean with Damp Cloth
CRYSTAL CLEAR - Vinyl with Seamed Edges (Unlike competing products, our Covers are NOT manufactured with powder of any kind)
MEASURES - 42"Back Height x 18"Front Height x 96”Width x 40”Depth
